column2: I list my favorite dishes and the dishes that miss
column3: but I would be listing the whole menu under the heading "delicious." The best approach is to come with a group of four to six people and try everything. Make sure to order the wood-roasted sweet potato bravas
column5: and the beef skewer with horseradish cream & red onions. Other favorites include any of the croquetas
column7: and the spicy potato bravas. I'm not a huge fan of artichoke dip and the goat cheese spreads in general
column8: so I would skip that but I know the rest of the table loved them.
